common.notTranslated: This page does not yet have a translation for your language :<

login-hello.introduction:
Welcome to the Love Live! School Idol Festival! private server.
Please do not post screenshots, videos and other content from this server and client in open sources to avoid blocking our server from Klab, and also follow our TOS.
Thank you!

login-login.successDescriptionLogin:
You have successfully logged in!
Close this window to enter the game.
login-login.mailNotExists: Account with this E-mail does not exist
login-login.sendError: An error occurred while sending the letter. Try again later
login-login.passwordResetSuccess: A new password has been sent to your mail
login-login.mailSuccess: A letter with a verification code was sent to the specified E-mail
login-login.confirmationCodeNotExists: Verification code is outdated, get a new one

login-startup.nicknameLimit: Field "Nickname" can't be more than 20 symbols
login-startup.passwordLimit: Field "Nickname" can't be more than 32 symbols
login-startup.checkMail:
We sent an email to the your email address mail.
Check the Spam folder if you cannot find it.
login-startup.successDescription:
Account #{{userId}} successfully created! Remember/save this number, it will be useful to you when you'll try to login.
{{mail}}To continue registration close this window.
login-startup.emailExists: An account with the specified E-mail is already registered

profile-index.eventDataIsMissing: The user has not yet participated in the events :c

settings-index.currentPasswordBlank: Поле "Current password" не может быть пустым
settings-index.currentPasswordLimit: Поле "Current password" не может быть больше 32 символов
settings-index.newPasswordBlank: Поле "New password" не может быть пустым
settings-index.newPasswordLimit: Поле "New password" не может быть больше 32 символов
settings-index.passwordNotice:
Handover ID is a PASSWORD from your account.
Don't send it to anyone, and in case of compromentation, change it.
settings-index.modsNotice: Tap on the name of the mod to find out what it affects.
settings-index.vanishTooltip:
Исчезание нот (как хидден в osu!)
Hidden — ноты исчезают перед приближением к кольцу.
Sudden — ноты появляются перед приближением к кольцу.
settings-index.mirrorTooltip:
Зеркалирование нот.
Если активирован, то ноты всего лайва меняются местами с параллельными им.
Первый слева становится первым справа и т.д.
settings-index.hpTooltip:
Изменение количества начального здоровья в лайве.
Применяется только для обычных лайвов!
settings-index.applyForEventTooltip: Позволяет использовать указанные настройки (кроме HP) для ивент-лайвов.

notice.REMOVED_FROM_FRIENDS: {{affectorName}} removed you from their friend list

noticemarquee.maintenanceNotice: In the period from {{startDay}} {{startTime}} to {{endDay}} {{endTime}} UTC{{timeZone}}, server will be unavailable due to maintenance
